gesta. A IOANNE LvDovIcoHauuenreutero. (Druckerm.

Excudebat Iosias Rihelius. M. D. LXXIII.
Am Schluss: ARGENTORATI, Excudebat losias Rihelius.
M. D. LXXIII.
